quote: Promise me this. When you find yourself in need of inspiration, bypass the roses that will clamor aimlessly for attention. And focus on the souls who have actually 'lived' among the thorns.
quote_letters: PROMISE ME THIS WHEN YOU FIND YOURSELF IN NEED OF INSPIRATION BYPASS THE ROSES THAT WILL CLAMOR AIMLESSLY FOR ATTENTION AND FOCUS ON THE SOULS WHO HAVE ACTUALLY LIVED AMONG THE THORNS
